short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One Click collection of online data

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For most businesses, it is vital to compile online data to drive sales, improve product offerings and gain market understanding. Kaddara helps you collect the data you need. The collection is done with a simple one-click operation whenever you need it. 

The Kaddara platform lets you select content from hundreds of sources with its pre-built templates. Half of the templates are designed to help you collect B2B leads; the other half is made to help you collect price and product data.

The data is saved as Excel files, ready to be imported to any business system. 

You can use Kaddara for free, and there is even more. You also get a free light to weigh Process Automation tool that lets you automate your tasks in minutes in an easy-to-use Dashboard.

More than 180.000 automation combinations are available without changing your current IT systems. Features include:

- Monitor competitor's price and product changes
- E-mail notifications
- Excel import into any online business system
- Real-time automation of manual data entry tasks
- Smart logic-based notifications
